content.html: I haven‚Äôt followed sports for years and I‚Äôm missing the feeling of being a fan, following a team and watching games. So I think I will start following MLS Soccer and watching games. Especially since they will be on AppleTV for me to view. Loyalty will be with the city I live in.

content.html: I love the idea of Public Transportation and the idea of living in a big city, not needing a car. Saying that I have been living in NYC for almost 3 years and rarely use it myself and would not bring my children on it. I consider it unsafe.
